mapper.select: INSERT INTO sys_app_menu (app_id, menu_id) VALUES (app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
SELECT smi.* FROM sys_menu_info smi LEFT JOIN sys_app_menu sam ON smi.id = sam.menu_id WHERE sam.app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND smi.delete_flag = 0 AND smi.hidden = 0 AND smi.status = 0
